Value: Creates a powerful avatar that summons invulnerable spirits from nearby corpses to attack your enemies. When the Avatar of Vengeance dies, the spirits vanish. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Summons 1 Spirit of Vengeance. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 2|r -  Summons 2 Spirits of Vengeance. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Summons 4 Spirits of Vengeance. |nLasts <AEsv,Dur1> seconds.
